text: Va ʙarojamon dar in dunjo va dar saroi oxirat neki muqarrar farmo, [ki] ʙe tardid, mo ʙa suji Tu ʙozgastem». [Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Azoʙamro ʙa har ki ʙixoham merasonam va rahmatam hama cizro faro giriftaast, pas, onro ʙaroi kasone muqarrar xoham dost, ki parvo pesa mekunand va zakot medihand va [hamcunin] ʙaroi kasone, ki ʙa ojoti mo imon meovarand
